title: Super Bowl LVI Preview
description:
Benjamin, Kaelen, and Steven discuss, dissect, and share their picks for Super Bowl LVI. They wrap up the pod with the final Games That Need Games and Gimme a Reason segments of the season (33:46).
Hosts: Benjamin Solak, Kaelen Jones, Steven Ruiz
Production Assistant: Chris Sutton and Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
